item.description:
HBA Boston- Plug into your HBA Chapter: Learn How You Can Volunteer!
When: Wednesday, January 12, from 5:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.
Where: Cambridge Science Center – Lobby Area
245 First Street
Cambridge, MA 02142
Website: http://www.hbanet.org...
Join this interactive program to learn more about ways you can expand your skills and contribute to the success of the Boston Healthcare Businesswomen’s Association (HBA) chapter through volunteering. The learning objectives are:
-Present the opportunities and benefits of volunteering.
-Gain an understanding of how a general program “comes together.”
-Learn about additional programs (WIS, LSS, Mentoring, Executive Women’s Series, Special Initiatives) and the supporting committees (Membership, Marketing, Talent Management).
-Identify the appropriate committee and role for specific personal interests.
item.name: HBA Boston- Plug into your HBA Chapter: Learn How You Can Volunteer!
